Statistical analysis shows Portsmouth winning 78% of their last 10 home games, placing them among the top performers in the league. Meanwhile, Ipswich Town's away record tells a challenging tale. Here's what the data predicts.

Stats Intro

Content for this section.


        Team Statistics Comparison
        
        Portsmouth:
        - League Position: 2
        - Points: 41
        - Goals Scored: 23
        - Goals Conceded: 14
        - Clean Sheets: 6
        - Form: LWWWD
        
        Ipswich Town:
        - League Position: 14
        - Points: 24
        - Goals Scored: 8
        - Goals Conceded: 16
        - Clean Sheets: 3
        - Form: WWDWW
        


        Head-to-Head Record
        
        In their last 24 meetings:
        - Portsmouth Wins: 3 (12%)
        - Draws: 7 (29%)
        - Ipswich Town Wins: 14 (58%)
        
        Average Goals: 3.4 per match
        Both Teams Scored: 66% of matches
        

Key Players to Watch

Portsmouth:
- Kevin Rice (Forward): 11 goals, 10 assists, Rating: 7.6
- Marcus Palmer (Midfielder): 5 goals, 4 assists, Rating: 7.2
- Phil Foden (Defender): 2 goals, 10 assists, Rating: 7.6

Ipswich Town:
- Erling Rashford (Forward): 3 goals, 9 assists, Rating: 7.1
- Martin Foden (Midfielder): 4 goals, 10 assists, Rating: 8.4
- Bukayo Haaland (Defender): 0 goals, 6 assists, Rating: 8.1


        Our AI Prediction
        
        Main Pick: Portsmouth to Win (48% probability)
        
        Match Result Probabilities:
        - Portsmouth: 48%
        - Draw: 29%
        - Ipswich Town: 23%
        
        Goals Markets:
        - Over 1.5 Goals: 80%
        - Over 2.5 Goals: 58%
        - Both Teams Score: 58%
        


        Odds Analysis
        
        Current Best Odds:
        - Portsmouth: 2.8 (implied 36%)
        - Draw: 3.1 (implied 32%)
        - Ipswich Town: 4.03 (implied 25%)
        

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Who will win Portsmouth vs Ipswich Town?
A: Based on our AI analysis, we predict Portsmouth has the best chance to win this match.

Q: What is the predicted score for Portsmouth vs Ipswich Town?

Q: Should I bet on Portsmouth vs Ipswich Town?
A: We recommend the Over 2.5 goals market based on both teams' attacking records.
